links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..16
A. V. Aho and N. J. A. Sloane, Some doubly exponential sequences, Fib. Quart., 11 (1973), 429-437.
Index entries for sequences of form a(n+1)=a(n)^2 + ...
mathematica: Join[{a=1,b=0},Table[c=b^2-a;a=b;b=c,{n,13}]] (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Jan 18 2011 *)RecurrenceTable[{a[0]==1, a[1]==0, a[n]==a[n-1]^2 - a[n-2]}, a, {n, 13}] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 11 2012 *)
prog: (PARI) a(n)=if(n<0, a(-1-n), if(n<2, 1-n, a(n-1)^2-a(n-2))) /* _Michael Somos_, May 05 2005 */
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Nov 15 2000
